TABLE.name: XSOperatorLog
TABLE.SQL: INSERT INTO XSOperatorLog ( IPAddress, WID, MenuID, MenuName, Action, Remark, OperatorID, OperatorName, CreateTime )VALUES( @IPAddress,@WID,@MenuID,@MenuName,@Action,@Remark,@OperatorID,@OperatorName,@CreateTime);
SELECT DISTINCT MenuID,MenuName FROM XSOperatorLog ORDER BY MenuID
